source.name: Aerometric Information Retrieval System (AIRS) Widget
source.description: The Aerometric Information Retrieval System (AIRS) widget allows users to enter a specific location and retrieve facilities in the area of interest that produce air emissions as reported by the Aerometric Information Retrieval System (AIRS).

datasets.name: Aerometric Information Retrieval System (AIRS) Widget
datasets.description: The Aerometric Information Retrieval System (AIRS) widget allows users to enter a specific location and retrieve facilities in the area of interest that produce air emissions as reported by the Aerometric Information Retrieval System (AIRS).
